name: Wild Dungeons
description:
A short but re-playable dungeon crawler that procedurally generates a new dungeon every time. You have one goal: to survive the perils of the dungeon and make your way to the exit by building a path with the blocks you pick up. 

Created for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021

Features:

  • Playable characters with their own unique play styles
  • One enemy that just appears everywhere you go
  • Turn-based movement and gameplay
  • Sword
  • Collect and place blocks
